price: 他们对信士不顾戚谊，不重盟约。这等人确是过分的。
arabic: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِي مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illan walā dhimmatan wa-ulāika humu al-muʿ'tadūna
